vocabularyItems.english: Always greet people politely when you meet them first.
I need time to acquaint myself with the new system.
She quickly befriended everyone in the new neighborhood yesterday.
It's important to socialize with colleagues outside of work.
Guests mingled and chatted during the cocktail party reception.
Children learn by interacting with other kids their age.
We conversed in French during our trip to Paris.
Don't gossip about people behind their backs ever please.
The rumor about the company closing proved to be false.
She gave me a nice compliment on my presentation.
The teacher praised the student for excellent work today.
Don't flatter me just to get what you want.
It's easy to criticize but hard to offer solutions.
The mother scolded her child for misbehaving in public.
The manager rebuked the employee for arriving late repeatedly.
You should apologize for your rude behavior immediately now.
Please forgive me for forgetting your birthday this year.
The two friends reconciled after their long argument yesterday.
The couple quarreled about money problems last night loudly.
They argue about politics every time they meet together.
The neighbors disputed over the property boundary line yesterday.
Students debated the topic passionately in class this morning.
Both sides must compromise to reach an agreement successfully.
Team members must cooperate to complete the project successfully.
Scientists from different countries collaborated on the research project.
Everyone is encouraged to participate in the discussion actively.
Each member contributed ideas to the group project yesterday.
Many people volunteer their time to help local charities.
Would you like me to accompany you to doctor?
Security guards escorted the VIP through the crowded area.
An experienced teacher mentored the new staff members carefully.
Friends tried to console her after the sad news.
The mother comforted her crying child with gentle words.
The doctor reassured the patient that everything would be fine.
Don't let failure discourage you from trying again tomorrow.
The bully tried to intimidate smaller children at school.
It's illegal to threaten people with violence or harm.
Schools must take action against students who bully others.
Don't tease your sister about her new haircut please.
It's cruel to mock people for their mistakes publicly.
They ridiculed his ideas without giving them proper consideration.
The teacher should never humiliate students in front of class.
Please don't embarrass me in front of my friends.
I didn't mean to offend you with my comments.
Calling someone stupid is a terrible insult to them.
Customers complained about the poor service at the restaurant.
Citizens protested against the new government policy loudly yesterday.
Residents signed a petition to save the local park.
The charity appealed for donations to help flood victims.
The defendant pleaded not guilty in court this morning.
I beg you to reconsider your decision about leaving.
She implored him to tell the truth about incident.
I request that you arrive on time for meeting.
Workers demanded better pay and working conditions from management.
He insisted on paying for dinner despite my protests.
You need to assert yourself more in meetings confidently.
He claimed to have seen the accident happen yesterday.
The witness alleged that the suspect was at scene.
Don't accuse people without having proper evidence first always.
Stop blaming others for your own mistakes and failures.
The international community condemned the violent attacks strongly yesterday.
The politician denounced corruption in the government publicly today.
He acknowledged his mistake and promised to improve performance.
She finally admitted that she was wrong about situation.
The suspect confessed to the crime after hours of questioning.
The investigation revealed shocking new evidence about the case.
Companies must disclose financial information to shareholders annually always.
Please don't divulge confidential information to anyone outside.
It's illegal to conceal evidence from the police.
The company withheld important information from the public deliberately.
The government tried to suppress news about the scandal.
Some countries censor the internet and block certain websites.
The school permits students to use phones during breaks.
Please allow me to explain the situation to you.
Only the manager can authorize large purchases for company.
The committee granted permission for the new building project.
The accused denied all charges against him in court.
She refused to answer any questions from reporters today.
The judge dismissed the case due to lack of evidence.
Don't ignore the warning signs of serious health problems.
Soldiers salute their commanding officers as a sign of respect.
In Japan people bow when greeting each other politely.
A firm handshake shows confidence during business meetings always.
Old friends embraced warmly after years of being apart.
She gave her mother a big hug when arriving.
He nodded his head to show agreement with proposal.
She winked at me across the room playfully yesterday.
He made a gesture with his hand to signal.
She beckoned me to come closer with her hand.
The king summoned his advisors to the throne room.
The committee will convene next week to discuss matters.
Students assembled in the hall for the important announcement.
Family members gathered for the annual reunion celebration yesterday.
People congregated in the square to hear the speech.
The lawyer will mediate the dispute between the two parties.
An independent judge will arbitrate the disagreement fairly today.
The teacher had to intervene to stop the argument.
Don't interfere in other people's personal business please.
The reconciliation between the two countries took many years.
The mediation process helped resolve the dispute peacefully yesterday.

liarGameData.explanation: A2 learners confuse these verbs. 'Say' = words spoken. 'Tell' = needs object (tell someone). 'Speak' = language/formal. 'Talk' = conversation.
liarGameData.practice: He said 'hello'. He told me the truth. She speaks French. Let's talk about it.
liarGameData.tip: Say + words. Tell + person. Speak + language. Talk = chat.
